description: Which of the following categories includes your age?
answer_choices: 18 to 24|25 to 34|35 to 45|45 to 54|55 or older

description: What is the highest level of school you have completed or the highest degree you have received?

description: If you went to college, what was your major?
answer_choices: For example, computer science, mechanical engineering, psychology, music, law, etc.

description: Have you worked for a technology company?
